betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oFor fast end efficient smelting, the dark and red matter furnaces are capable of smelting items using EMC.

Place energy collectors around the furnace to make it run without fuel.

The more collectors, and the higher the tier, the faster the furnace!

§fTelos is such a lovely place! Not only I get access to all the furnace goodness I could dream of, but I also ca access some new alchemical smelting toys!
